name: OREESOL
metaTitle: OREESOL Properties Costa Blanca | New Build Homes
metaDescription: Discover 5 premium properties by OREESOL. Villas and apartments across Santa Rosalia and Hacienda del Alamo. Modern developments on Costa Blanca.
heroHeadline: OREESOL - Premium New Build Properties Across Costa Blanca
heroIntro:
OREESOL represents a curated selection of contemporary residential developments across the Costa Blanca's most sought-after locations. With 5 available properties spanning multiple exclusive developments, OREESOL offers buyers access to thoughtfully designed homes in prime areas including Santa Rosalia Lake And Life Resort and Hacienda del Alamo.

Our current portfolio showcases diverse property options from the developer's flagship projects: Apartamentos Turisticos Santa Rosalia, Mirador Hills, Villas Martina, and Miragolf Hills. Each development reflects a commitment to modern living standards, strategic location planning, and lifestyle amenities that appeal to both investors and permanent residents seeking quality homes on the Costa Blanca.

aboutSection.title: About OREESOL
aboutSection.content:
OREESOL has established itself as a developer focused on creating residential communities that blend contemporary design with the natural advantages of their chosen locations. Their projects demonstrate a careful approach to development, with properties that serve both seasonal and permanent residents looking for quality construction and thoughtful planning.

The developer's portfolio spans multiple property types across distinct regional zones, suggesting a diversified approach to residential development. This variety allows potential buyers to find options that match their specific needs and investment goals within their established communities.

specializationSection.title: Developments & Locations
specializationSection.content:
OREESOL operates across two distinct Costa Blanca regions, each offering unique lifestyle characteristics. Santa Rosalia Lake And Life Resort represents a lakeside living concept with recreational amenities, while Hacienda del Alamo serves buyers seeking established residential communities with golf and resort-style infrastructure.

Their four main developments—Apartamentos Turisticos Santa Rosalia, Mirador Hills, Villas Martina, and Miragolf Hills—showcase different property typologies suited to various buyer preferences. Whether targeting vacation rental potential or permanent residency, OREESOL's portfolio addresses multiple market segments across Costa Blanca's most desirable zones.

qualitySection.title: Quality & Specifications
qualitySection.content: OREESOL properties reflect modern construction standards with attention to both aesthetic appeal and functional design. Each development incorporates contemporary building practices while respecting the character of its location. Properties feature quality finishes, practical layouts, and connections to community amenities that enhance daily living and investment potential.

reasons.title: Diverse Development Portfolio
reasons.description: Four distinct projects across premium Costa Blanca locations provide flexibility in choosing the right property type and community fit.

reasons.title: Strategic Locations
reasons.description: Properties positioned in established zones with existing infrastructure, amenities, and proven appeal to international buyers.

reasons.title: Modern Construction
reasons.description: Contemporary designs and quality finishes reflect current building standards and lifestyle expectations for today's buyers.

faqs.question: Where are OREESOL properties located?
faqs.answer: OREESOL properties are located in two main zones: Santa Rosalia Lake And Life Resort and Hacienda del Alamo, both on the Costa Blanca South. These areas offer established infrastructure and lifestyle amenities.

faqs.question: What types of properties does OREESOL develop?
faqs.answer: The developer offers a mix of villas, apartments, and townhouses across their four main developments: Apartamentos Turisticos Santa Rosalia, Mirador Hills, Villas Martina, and Miragolf Hills.

faqs.question: Are OREESOL properties suitable for investment?
faqs.answer: Yes. Several properties, particularly those in tourism-focused developments, offer rental potential. Location in established resort communities supports both holiday letting and long-term occupancy.

conclusion: Explore our current selection of 5 OREESOL properties available now. Each represents opportunity within established Costa Blanca communities known for quality construction and strategic positioning. Browse our full listings to find the property that matches your requirements.
